short_summary: Demolition of the existing wood crib at Biolog Island (approximately 6'0" x 6'0" x 3'0")
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: DB-CD3 Bio-Log Island Crib Demolition**
**Reference Number:** cb-941-76690092
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 30005300
**Publication Date:** April 8, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 23, 2024 at 14:00 ET

**Project Overview:**
The government is soliciting bids for the demolition of the existing wood crib at Biolog Island (LL 5034). The crib is located on the Southeastern side of Georgian Bay, approximately 11km West of Potters Landing, Ontario. The site is accessible by water only.

**Scope of Work:**
The winning bidder will be responsible for the following tasks:

* Mobilizing to the site with a work barge of suitable size and certification
* Demolishing the existing wood crib, associated rock, and any submerged supports
* Cutting and removing any remaining rebar and reinforcements connected to rock below
* Demobilizing from the site
* Disposing of all waste at a licensed waste disposal facility

**Project Timeline:**
Site work is expected to take approximately one day and must be completed by September 27, 2024. A detailed Environmental Protection Plan must be implemented and must account for the items listed in the specifications, as well as the demolition of the structure and transportation of the demolished goods from the site to the licensed waste disposal facility.

**Enquiries:**
All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the bid closing date.

**Contact Information:**
- Contact Name: Paul Fortier
- Email: paul.fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 596-9926
- Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6, Canada
